title: Can a new revert PRAY wearing headphones or read Fatiha from a paper? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript:
[Questioner] from Singapore my question is uh 
can a new reward uh pre-seller while wearing   headphones because he keep on forgetting his uh 
Al-Fatiha can he wear can he pray wearing what   wearing earbuds or headphones okay so a new revert

or the reciter says in his ears he says and the   guy says this is permissible this is totally
